context.p: In this lab exercise you will download and install a CentOS 5 Linux image from the EuStore. You will create a key pair that can be used to authenticate to an instance at log in. Using the CentOS image you will launch, view, and terminate instances using the euca2ools. You will also customize the image in order to make a new image. Lastly, you will deregister and remove an image from your cloud.

Lab Objectives:
Download and register a CentOS 5 image
Launch and connect to an instance using euca2ools
Download and unbundle an image
Customize an image
Test the customized image
Remove an image
